original_text: And when he humbled himself the wrath of the Lord turned from him, so as not to make a complete destruction. Moreover, conditions were good in Judah.
korean_text: 르호보암이 스스로 겸비하였고 유다에 선한 일도 있으므로 여호와께서 노를 돌이키사 다 멸하지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: the wrath of the Lord turned from him
so as not to make a complete destruction
Moreover, conditions were good in Judah
